286.movie_name: City Slickers II: The Legend of Curly's Gold (1994)

218.movie_plot: A man robs a bank to pay for his lover's operation; it turns into a hostage situation and a media circus.

242.movie_plot: Set at the intersection of the near future and the reimagined past, explore a world in which every human appetite, no matter how noble or depraved, can be indulged without consequence.

71.movie_plot: When a childless couple of an ex-con and an ex-cop decide to help themselves to one of another family's quintuplets, their lives become more complicated than they anticipated.

240.movie_plot: In a futuristic city sharply divided between the working class and the city planners, the son of the city's mastermind falls in love with a working class prophet who predicts the coming of a savior to mediate their differences.

116.movie_plot: Babe, a pig raised by sheepdogs, learns to herd sheep with a little help from Farmer Hoggett.

188.movie_plot: An ingenue insinuates herself into the company of an established but aging stage actress and her circle of theater friends.

166.movie_name: Treasure of the Sierra Madre, The (1948)
166.movie_plot: Fred Dobbs and Bob Curtin, two Americans searching for work in Mexico, convince an old prospector to help them mine for gold in the Sierra Madre Mountains.

272.movie_plot: Romance and suspense ensue in Paris as a woman is pursued by several men who want a fortune her murdered husband had stolen. Who can she trust?
